message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I think it's a great deal and will be very useful for you.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $90 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I appreciate your interest in the product.  I can lower the price to $110, but I can't go any lower than that. I believe this is a fair offer considering the value it provides.
Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
